creditline: Gift of Jane B. and Martin E. Abel, from the estate of Dr. Samuel and Edith K. Beirstein
description: round bulbous body with spout, 2 attached handles at top; bamboo handle with 2 braided cord fastners; one side of bamboo handle also attached by blue rubber band and masking tape; lid with handle; dark blue

title: Teapot
